weather.precipitation: Spring in Salzburg is characterized by moderate rainfall, with occasional sunny days.
weather.what_to_pack: Pack layers, including a light jacket, umbrella, and comfortable walking shoes.

tourism.crowds: Moderate to high tourist density, increasing towards late spring.
tourism.costs: Accommodation and attraction prices are slightly lower than peak summer season.
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations and popular attractions in advance, especially for the later part of spring.

highlights.name: Easter Markets
highlights.description: Experience traditional Easter markets with local crafts and festive foods.
highlights.tips: Visit early to avoid crowds and sample local Easter treats.

highlights.name: Sound of Music Tours
highlights.description: Explore the iconic filming locations of the Sound of Music movie.
highlights.tips: Book tours in advance for a seamless experience.

highlights.name: Mozart Week
highlights.description: Celebrate the renowned composer with concerts and events.
highlights.tips: Check the event schedule and book tickets ahead of time.

highlights.name: Hiking in the Alps
highlights.description: Enjoy the blooming alpine landscapes and scenic trails.
highlights.tips: Pack water and snacks for longer hikes and check trail conditions.

highlights.name: Salzburg Spring Festival
highlights.description: Experience classical music performances in historic venues.
highlights.tips: Reserve tickets early for popular shows.

highlights.name: Hellbrunn Palace and Trick Fountains
highlights.description: Visit the playful trick fountains and beautiful palace gardens.
highlights.tips: Plan for a half-day visit and wear waterproof clothing for the fountain surprises.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy the mild weather and blooming scenery along the riverbanks.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Rent bikes in the city center and follow designated cycling paths.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Witness the colorful spring blooms in the well-maintained gardens.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Best visited early in the day to avoid crowds.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Experience the picturesque village and surrounding lakes in a quieter setting.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Take an early train to maximize your time in Hallstatt.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Combine a cultural experience with fine dining in historic venues.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Book dinner concert packages for a complete evening of entertainment.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Marvel at panoramic views of Salzburg and the surrounding Alps with milder temperatures.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Wear comfortable shoes for the uphill walk to the fortress.

recommended_activities.activity: Take a boat tour on Lake Wolfgangsee
recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy the tranquil lake and mountain views with blossoming spring landscapes.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check tour schedules and weather conditions before booking.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: See animals in a lush spring setting with fewer visitors.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Plan for a half-day visit and attend feeding sessions for a closer look at the animals.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Experience the local tradition of beer garden openings with live music and fresh brews.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check the opening dates and arrive early to secure a good spot.

not_recommended: Outdoor activities without checking the weather forecast due to sudden rain showers.
